job_description: Reporting/Analytics Engineer at ScopelyYou are the rare breed of business-savvy and analytical.  A powerhouse of action-oriented insights - you would love to get your hands on terabytes of player, revenue and game data to find nuggets of insights that help drive improvement in customer/player game experience. You're excited by the prospect of driving game teams, including product managers, marketing, and game designers, with your data-focused approaches to all game decisions. If this describes you, this is the role for you!What will you do?-Analyze large, complex data sets representing the behavior of millions of online and mobile game players to address strategic and operational business questions-Own the insights for a specific game and drive needle moving improvements by working with all organization from engineering to marketing-Develop frameworks, models, tools, and processes to ensure data influences decisions at all levels
job_requirements: What do you need?-Intellectual curiosity, analytical rigor, hard-working and a good business intuition are musts!-Ability to communicate complex results throughout an organization-Excel in your holster-You're a SQL pro-A love games - especially mid-core or casual ones!Open To All Majors:No
